author: View All Posts Okogba
title: Chelsea must have to win more games — Victor Moses - Vanguard News
text:
Home » Sports » Chelsea must have to win more games — Victor Moses Chelsea must have to win more games — Victor Moses On 2:28 am In Sports by Okogba Comments 
C helsea may be run away leaders of the English Premier League with ten points clear, but according to wing back Victor Moses, the Blues need to keep winning their games to seal the title. 
The Super Eagles attacking midfielder who was drafted to the right back by coach Antonio Conte added that Chelsea need to remain focused on the work ahead. 
“We just want to stay grounded and win as many games as we can between now and the end of the season. Chelsea’s Brazilian-born Spanish striker Diego Costa (C) celebrates scoring their second goal with Chelsea’s Nigerian midfielder Victor Moses (L) and Chelsea’s Spanish defender Marcos Alonso (2L) during the English Premier League football match between Southampton and Chelsea at St Mary’s Stadium in Southampton, southern England on October 30, 2016. AFP 
“We’re not looking at the table at the moment, we still have 12 matches to play and we just need to take each game as it comes. 
“We’re going to stay focused and keep working hard together as a team, as everyone can see we’re doing well,” Moses told Chelsea website. 
He admitted that he always wanted to return to Chelsea and prove himself as an integral part of their squad. 
Moses’ career at Chelsea looked over before it had even begun when he was loaned out to Liverpool, Stoke and then West Ham over the last three seasons. 
“I’ve always wanted to play for this big club, it’s one of the best clubs in the world at the moment and I’m enjoying every single minute. 
Chelsea extended their lead at the top of the Premier League table to 10 points at the weekend with a 3-1 win over Swansea. Okogba
